Data: Boland to S Dhawan, no run short on middle, Dhawan chops it to the off side, adjacent to the pitch. He looks for a quick single. It isn't there
Boland to S Dhawan, 1 run back of a length on middle, punched to the off-side sweeper
Boland to Kohli, no run full on off, Kohli is forward and across in defence
Boland to Kohli, no run full ball on off, solidly blocked on the front foot
Boland to Kohli, 1 run full on middle, Kohli shuffles across off and clips it in front of square on the leg side
Boland to S Dhawan, 1 run dug in short on middle, Dhawan pulls one down to Faulkner at the square leg boundary
Faulkner to S Dhawan, no run back of a length on middle and leg, Dhawan does not have room to free his arms. Bunted defensively to short midwicket
Faulkner to S Dhawan, no run fullish on off, blocked on the front foot
Faulkner to S Dhawan, FOUR runs length ball on off, Dhawan picks it up, whips his wrists, and goes over midwicket
Faulkner to S Dhawan, 1 run short and banged in, targetting the ribs. Pulled down to long leg
Faulkner to Kohli, no run length ball, angled wide of Smith at slip
Faulkner to Kohli, no run full and angling away, Kohli dabs it towards backward point now
Maxwell to S Dhawan, no run nicely tossed up on middle, blocked with bat and pad close together
Maxwell to S Dhawan, 1 run Dhawan stays back and turns a single to square leg
Maxwell to Kohli, 1 run quicker offbreak, Kohli skips back and clips to deep midwicket
Maxwell to S Dhawan, 2 runs guided off the pads to long leg
Maxwell to S Dhawan, 1 run very full on middle, jabbed past the covers
Maxwell to Kohli, no run this one slides on at 90ks, Kohli goes back and flicks behind square
Faulkner to S Dhawan, no run full on middle, blocked to short midwicket
Faulkner to S Dhawan, no run short ball on off, punchily played to short cover
Faulkner to S Dhawan, no run jabbed from outside off to mid-off
Faulkner to S Dhawan, no run Faulkner ventures shorter and pushes the batsman back. Fended
Faulkner to S Dhawan, 1 run dug in outside off, not much pace there to trouble Dhawan. He rolls his wrists on a pull to S Marsh at deep midwicket
Faulkner to Kohli, 1 run flicked neatly through midwicket
Maxwell to Kohli, 1 run full on off from round the wicket, nurdled behind square for a well-judged single
Maxwell to S Dhawan, 1 run flat on the pads, whipped through midwicket
Maxwell to Kohli, no run Kohli uses his feet and flicks to mid-on, half-save from the fielder at short midwicket
Maxwell to Kohli, 1 run milked down to long-on
Maxwell to S Dhawan, 1 leg bye tickled off the pads just behind square for one
Maxwell to Kohli, no run slides across off, blocked to the leg side on the back foot
Faulkner to S Dhawan, 1 run Dhawan skips out, meets a full ball, and drives it to mid-off
Faulkner to Kohli, 1 run full and slanting away outside off, Kohli drives nicely on the front foot, but Finch flings to his left at mid-off and takes sheen off the shot
Faulkner to S Dhawan, 1 run slower ball outside off, Dhawan waits for it to arrive and eases it to deep cover
Faulkner to Kohli, 1 run pitched up and angling away, crisply driven to deep cover
Faulkner to S Dhawan, no run Dhawan charges at Faulkner. The bowler shortens his length, this gets big on Dhawan. He gloves it onto the pitch
Faulkner to S Dhawan, 1 run back of the hand slower ball at 111ks, Dhawan drags a pull past midwicket
Maxwell to S Dhawan, no run full on middle, Dhawan answers with a dead bat
Maxwell to S Dhawan, no run loopier on middle, blocked on the front foot
Maxwell to S Dhawan, 1 run pitched up and outside off, front-foot drive past cover. Kohli says no to the second run
Maxwell to Kohli, 1 run Kohli skips out and flicks to long-on
Maxwell to S Dhawan, 1 run Dhawan now twinkles down, meets the pitch, and secures a single to long-off
Maxwell to Kohli, 1 run heading down the leg side, swept to Hastings at long leg
Boland to Kohli, 1 run full and outside off, forward and guided to third man
Boland to S Dhawan, no run short and outside off, slapped to point. Maxi is lurking there
Boland to S Dhawan, no run bouncer outside off, keeps low, beats the attempted pull
Boland to S Dhawan, no run back of a length on middle, punchily played to cover
Boland to S Dhawan, no run Maxi dives to his right at backward point and stops this late dab from Dhawan
Boland to S Dhawan, 1 wide Boland bangs this lifter down leg

Boland to S Dhawan, FOUR runs short on the hips, Dhawan does not connect with the pull properly. He gets a bottom edge, and that's enough for a four, fine on the leg side, the first boundary since the 12th over. Just six boundaries overall in 18 overs
Marsh to Kohli, 1 run rising ball on off, gently pulled behind square. Kohli is keen on the second, but a quick Wade denies that
Marsh to S Dhawan, no run short ball on middle, punched to point. A brief miscommunication, but no harm for India
Marsh to S Dhawan, no run whipped off the pads to short midwicket. Another yes-no moment for India
Marsh to S Dhawan, 1 run short ball on middle, Dhawan edges another pull to long leg
Marsh to Kohli, 1 run flicked from outside off to long-on
Marsh to S Dhawan, no run short and outside off, slapped to Maxi at point
Boland to Kohli, 2 runs back of a length on off, Kohli manipulates it behind square with the wrists. He sprints back for the second
Boland to Kohli, 1 run full and outside off, guided towards backward point. Ticked over for one. Dhawan should do more of this
Boland to S Dhawan, 1 run back of a length and outside off, chopped towards third man on the back foot
Boland to Kohli, no run back of a length, Kohli now chops it behind to Wade. There was not much width to cut that away
Boland to Kohli, 1 run nudged behind point for one more. Good, early call from Kohli
Boland to S Dhawan, no run Dhawan angles one to backward point, finds the fielder
Marsh to Kohli, FOUR runs short and outside off, Kohli unleashes a cut and sends it to the left of Maxi at point. Whistles away to the boundary
Marsh to Kohli, 1 run full and aimed at off, whipped towards long-on
Marsh to S Dhawan, no run short on middle, dabbed in front of cover
Marsh to S Dhawan, no run back of a length on middle and leg, weakly punched to short midwicket
Marsh to S Dhawan, FOUR runs Dhawan loosens his shackles. He runs down the track, the bowler pitched it short. Flat-bat pull over midwicket
Marsh to S Dhawan, no run almost dragged on. Full and outside off, Dhawan gets across, does not connect well with a cover-drive. The ball rolls behind
Boland to Kohli, no run full ball on off, tentatively defended back to the bowler
Boland to Kohli, 2 runs fractionally short and outside off, flashed in the air... to the left of a diving Maxi at point. Dhawan drops his bat while running. The pair has to settle with two
Boland to Kohli, no run back of a length, defended on the front foot
Boland to Kohli, FOUR runs short and ample width outside off, Kohli lashes a cut behind point, to the right of Maxi now
Boland to Kohli, 2 runs back of a length, turned into the vacant midwicket region. Smart placement and better running here
Boland to Kohli, no run fullish ball on the stumps, defended back to the bowler
Maxwell to S Dhawan, no run Dhawan comes down, does not meet the pitch, and takes it on the pad
Maxwell to S Dhawan, 2 runs full and outside off, leans forward, meets the pitch, and drives past cover
Maxwell to S Dhawan, FOUR runs pushed through on middle and leg, Dhawan goes low and slog-sweeps over midwicket
Maxwell to S Dhawan, 1 run milked down to long-on now. Dhawan catches up with Kohli
Maxwell to Kohli, 1 run Kohli uses his feet and flicks past midwicket for a 51-ball fifty. That's his third successive fifty in the series. Kohli raises his bat and acknowledges the cheers
Maxwell to S Dhawan, 1 run Dhawan eases to deep cover and brings up a fifty of his own. Can India kick into next gear?
Kane Richardson to S Dhawan, 1 run short and on off, pulled to deep midwicket
Kane Richardson to Kohli, no run good length and around off, poked out to point
Kane Richardson to Kohli, 1 run full and outside off, helped to third man with a controlled outside edge
Kane Richardson to S Dhawan, no run Dhawan skips out again, he has a big whoosh and misses. The ball zips through to the keeper. Richardson is quick
Kane Richardson to S Dhawan, 1 run Dhawan rocks back and pulls this short ball over midwicket
Kane Richardson to Kohli, no run fuller and outside off, dabbed to backward point
Maxwell to S Dhawan, no run swept from outside off to short fine leg
Maxwell to S Dhawan, no run pushed through, front-foot drive to cover
Maxwell to S Dhawan, FOUR runs tossed up on middle, Dhawan goes low and sweeps it over backward square leg. 100 partnership up. Kohli embraces Dhawan who looks more relaxed now
Maxwell to S Dhawan, 1 run pitched up, skiddy ball, played to long-on
Maxwell to Kohli, no run another hurrying ball, nudged behind square on the back foot
Maxwell to Kohli, no run bowled round the legs? Drifting onto the leg stump, Kohli shapes to sweep and misses. I guess the ball brushed Wade's pads/boot and knocked off the bails
Kane Richardson to S Dhawan, 1 run back-foot punch to deep cover
Kane Richardson to Kohli, 1 run short, rising ball, Kohli is rushed into a pull. He ends up deflecting it behind square
Kane Richardson to S Dhawan, no run Dhawan steps away, misses the late cut
Kane Richardson to S Dhawan, 2 runs short on the pads, Dhawan short-arms it away over backward square leg
Kane Richardson to S Dhawan, FOUR runs Dhawan has nailed this! Fractionally short on off, Dhawan is on the front foot as he pulls to the wide long-on boundary
Kane Richardson to S Dhawan, no run Dhawan shows his ace a bit early as he dances out, Richardson gets some steep bounce on this short ball, which thuds into the gloves of Wade. Dhawan ignores it
Hastings to Kohli, 2 runs room outside off, cut to third man
Hastings to Kohli, 1 run slippery full ball on off, angled to third man
Hastings to S Dhawan, no run chopped from the stumps to the keeper
Hastings to S Dhawan, FOUR runs Dhawan lobs it over Wade for four! Dhawan aims to pull and scoops it over Wade off the toe end. He chases in vain

Hastings to S Dhawan, OUT Hastings bowls Dhawan and lets out a roar! Full and Dhawan shuffles across off. He wants to pick it up and lift it away over square leg. No dice. Hastings nails the leg stump. Hastings has reward for hitting the deck hard and tying down India
Hastings to Rahane, no run bouncer outside off, Rahane rocks his head out of the way
Maxwell to Kohli, 1 run pitched up on middle, Kohli advances and hits to long-on
Maxwell to Rahane, 1 run Rahane now uses his feet and knocks it to long-on
Maxwell to Kohli, no run slides on middle, played to square leg
Maxwell to Kohli, 1 run darted short, pulled to long-on
Maxwell to Rahane, 1 run drifting onto the leg stump, helped to long leg with a sweep
Maxwell to Kohli, 1 leg bye darted into the leg stump, hits the pad and rolls behind square
Hastings to Kohli, 1 run back of a length and outside off, punchy drive to mid-off, another diving save
Hastings to Rahane, 1 run Hastings pounds the deck again, short and just outside off, chopped to third man
Hastings to Kohli, no run back of a length on off, worked to short midwicket. Bailey is prowling there
Hastings to Kohli, no run Kohli flashes and misses in the corridor. Hastings scoots past the outside edge
Hastings to Kohli, 1 run dabbed down to third man, Kohli plays closer to the body
Hastings to Rahane, no run full and outside off, Rahane transfers his weight on the front foot and displays a serene drive to mid-off
Maxwell to Kohli, 1 run Kohli dances out and eases a single down the ground
Maxwell to Rahane, no run slid on off, Rahane steps out and flicks to midwicket
Maxwell to Rahane, 1 run heading down leg, glanced to fine leg
Maxwell to Kohli, 1 run slapped from outside off to long-on
Maxwell to Rahane, 1 run Rahane jumps out of the crease again, gets too close to the pitch, and clips a single towards square leg
Maxwell to Kohli, 1 run Kohli now flicks it off the pads to deep midwicket
Hastings to Kohli, 1 run short and outside off, square-cut away
Hastings to Rahane, 1 run back of a length and outside off, Rahane glides it to third man
Hastings to Kohli, 1 run short on off, tapped to midwicket
Hastings to Rahane, FOUR runs beats mid-on (Smith) to his left! Full on middle, Rahane leans forward and exquisitely drives it down the ground. Smith slams his hands onto the turf
Hastings to Rahane, no run back of a length and outside off, Rahane bottom-edges a cut behind to Wade
Hastings to Rahane, no run short at 141ks, Rahane was late onto the pull. He is socked on the shoulder
Maxwell to Kohli, no run Kohli takes a step out and works to square leg
Maxwell to Kohli, no run straight in line, turned to midwicket
Maxwell to Kohli, 1 run another leg-side shot. Full on middle, down the track and whipped past midwicket
Maxwell to Rahane, 2 runs slides on, Rahane stands tall and punches past cover
Maxwell to Rahane, no run Rahane uses his feet and hits this back to Maxi
Maxwell to Rahane, 1 run darted on the leg stump, pulled to long leg with a whirl of the wrists
Faulkner to Rahane, 1 run width outside off, slashed past the covers
Faulkner to Kohli, FOUR runs angled full on off, Kohli lunges forward and crunches it in the air.... Hits the gap between covers and mid-off
Faulkner to Kohli, 1 run pokey drive to cover, Finch gathers the ball, under-arm flicks it onto the stumps. They pinch a single off the richochet
Faulkner to Rahane, no run full ball, pushed down the ground
Faulkner to Rahane, no run full and on the stumps, drilled down the ground, Faulkner gets a hand to it, but can't deflect it back onto the stumps, like the way he ran out Rohit in the previous match
Faulkner to Rahane, no run shortish on off, defended back to the bowler
Maxwell to Kohli, 1 run flat on the pads, whipped to deep midwicket
Maxwell to Rahane, FOUR runs Rahane steps out, backs away, and caresses it inside out over the covers. Top, top shot
Maxwell to Rahane, 1 run slides on middle, punched to Richardson at long-on
Maxwell to Kohli, no run pitched up and outside off, played back to the bowler
Maxwell to Kohli, 1 run slides on again, guided from outside off to short third man
Maxwell to Rahane, no run clipped off the pads to square leg
Faulkner to Kohli, no run short and outside off, cut to Maxi at backward point
Faulkner to Kohli, no run angled outside off, dabbed to Maxi again
Faulkner to Kohli, no run Maxi comes into play again. Full and aimed at off, tapped to backward point with a slight open face
Faulkner to Kohli, no run full on off, turned to short midwicket
Faulkner to Kohli, 1 run Kohli uses his feet, the bowler pitches it short. Guided wide of backward point. Kohli and Faulkner share a few words
Faulkner to Rahane, no run back of a length, tennis-ball bounce outside off, beats Rahane's late cut
Boland to Kohli, no run full on off, pushed to midwicket

Boland to Kohli, 2 runs Kohli dances out and slices this full ball in the air. Marsh, from sweeper cover, was late to pick up the ball, with the sun squinting into his eyes. He belatedly sprints in, but the ball lands in front of him
Boland to Kohli, SIX runs what.a.shot! Kohli runs down the track and launches it high and over long-on, first six of the match in the 36th over
Boland to Kohli, 1 run
Boland to Rahane, 1 run short on off, pulled behind square
Boland to Kohli, 2 runs full on off, flicked behind square. Kohli races across for the second
Faulkner to Rahane, no run full and nips in, whistles past the outside edge as Rahane sought to run down to third man
Faulkner to Rahane, no run back of a length, jabbed to the left of short midwicket
Faulkner to Rahane, FOUR runs dug in short, Rahane attacks it and pulls it over mid-on who is in the circle. One bounce four
Faulkner to Rahane, no run slippery bouncing ball outside off, Rahane bends his back but can't upper-cut it away
Faulkner to Rahane, no run slower ball at 115ks from Faulkner, he fools Rahane, beats the flick and hits the pad
Faulkner to Rahane, 1 run back of the hand slower ball again, diverted behind to the keeper
Boland to Rahane, no run length ball on off, pushed to the left of short midwicket
Boland to Rahane, no run full on the stumps, Rahane can't connect with the flick again
Boland to Rahane, 2 runs glanced off the pads behind square
Boland to Rahane, no run back of a length, Rahane leans back and late-cuts it to short third man
Boland to Rahane, 1 run just wide of Bailey at short midwicket. Full and on middle, chipped in the air to the right of Bailey who was diving to his right
Boland to Kohli, 1 run low full toss, drilled to long-on
Kane Richardson to Kohli, no run Richardson comes back and digs it short and outside off as Kohli steps out. Guided to backward point
Kane Richardson to Kohli, no run full on off, picked away to short midwicket, straight to Bailey this time
Kane Richardson to Kohli, 1 run length and outside off, slotted through the covers
Kane Richardson to Rahane, 1 run lifting ball, close to off. Rahane hops and angles it to short third man
Kane Richardson to Kohli, 1 run turned from off through backward square leg
Kane Richardson to Rahane, no run chopped from the off stump to short third man
Boland to Kohli, 1 run shorter as Boland is wary of Kohli stepping out, dabbed to the off side
Boland to Rahane, SIX runs Rahane advances, meets a full ball, and drives it straight down the ground. Kohli pats him on the helmet
Boland to Rahane, 1 run back of a length, chopped to the off side for one
Boland to Kohli, 1 run Kohli keeps jumping down the track, he has to deal with another short ball. Jabbed into the point area
Boland to Rahane, 1 leg bye short and on the hips, deflected square on the leg side
Boland to Kohli, 1 run pitched up on off, Kohli targets the leg side and ends up getting a soft leading edge that rolls to mid-off
Kane Richardson to Kohli, 1 run Kohli skips out and lashes it to Maxi at deep cover. Kohli is keen to take on Maxi's arm. Rahane rightly says no
Kane Richardson to Rahane, 1 run Rahane comes down, gets a dipping full toss, and bunts it to long-on
Kane Richardson to Kohli, 1 run back of a length, hits the thigh, as Kohli misses the flick
Kane Richardson to Rahane, FOUR runs short on off, Rahane firmly pulls it behind square. He controlled it superbly to split the two fielders in the deep
Kane Richardson to Rahane, 1 run Rahane turns his head, searching for the ball. Oh, where is it? He shapes for a drive, but drops it in front of his toes off an inside edge
Kane Richardson to Kohli, no run Kohli moves away outside leg, the bowler chases him with a near yorker, jabbed to short midwicket
Boland to Rahane, no run back of a length on off, turned to midwicket on the front foot
Boland to Rahane, no run Rahane is on the walk as he misses the flick
Boland to Rahane, 1 run down the track and hoicked behind square
Boland to Kohli, 1 run Kohli uses his feet and whips squarer, to deep midwicket
Boland to Rahane, 1 run back of a length, glanced to long leg
Boland to Kohli, 2 runs Kohli jumps out of the crease again, whipped over backward square. The throw from the deep is a little rocket
Kane Richardson to Rahane, no run Rahane dances out, Richardson tricks him with a slower ball, sliced off a thick edge, just dies in front of Boland. He picks up on the half-volley at short third man
Kane Richardson to Rahane, 1 run leg-stump ball, helped to long leg with a pull
Kane Richardson to Kohli, FOUR runs crackling hit! Pitched further up on off, Kohli snaps his wrists and shovels over midwicket. Very, very, wristy
Kane Richardson to Kohli, 1 run back of a length on off, Kohli picks it away behind square. Kohli leaps, pumps his fist! He brings up his 24th ODI century, gets a hug from Rahane
Kane Richardson to Rahane, 2 wide Richardson drifts a slower ball down leg, wide. Wade is beaten
Kane Richardson to Kohli, 1 run back of a length, clipped to midwicket
Kane Richardson to Rahane, 1 run full and outside off, nice flowy drive to short cover, who dives to his right, and deflects the ball to mid-off
Boland to Rahane, 1 run Rahane uses his feet and skies one in front of long-on off a leading edge
Boland to Kohli, 1 run whipped through backward square leg for one
Boland to Rahane, 1 leg bye full ball, Rahane can't pick it up over midwicket, takes it on the thigh pad as the ball rolls on the pitch. Kohli scampers across for a single
Boland to Kohli, 1 run down the track and short-armed away over midwicket
Boland to Rahane, 1 run full and straight, twirled to long-on
Boland to Kohli, SIX runs #MCG is so big, but Kohli clears the boundary again! He charges down the track, manufactures a full ball, and slugs it over cow corner. India need more blows
Hastings to Kohli, no run low full toss on off, creamed to Bailey at extra cover

Hastings to Kohli, OUT Kohli steps out and hits it straight into the lap of extra cover. Hastings rolls his fingers across this slower one outside off, 120ks, Kohli slaps it to Bailey. Looked like a leg-breakish slower one. Kohli, who can't manufacture his own pace, is out for a run-a-ball 117
Hastings to Gurkeerat, no run back of a length on off, worked to short midwicket on the back foot
Hastings to Gurkeerat, no run bumper on the leg stump, zings through to the keeper. The debutant ducks his head out of the way
Hastings to Gurkeerat, 2 runs another short one, Gurkeerat top-edges a pull over midwicket
Hastings to Gurkeerat, 1 run another short ball, but not short enough. Helped to fine leg
Faulkner to Gurkeerat, 1 run short and outside off, cut away behind point. MS is back on strike
Faulkner to Dhoni, 1 run back of a length, slogged to long-on
Faulkner to Gurkeerat, FOUR runs shortish and on the hips, Gurkeerat nails a pull behind square

Faulkner to Gurkeerat, OUT Gurkeerat undone by the slower ball. This is a Faulkner special, comes from the back of the hand, Gurkeerat does not spot it. He is early into the slog and drags it back onto the leg stump off a thick inside edge. Two slower balls. Two wickets in two overs
Faulkner to Jadeja, 2 runs low full toss outside off, driven to deep cover. The pair run hard for the second
Faulkner to Jadeja, 1 run pushed full and outside off, driven to mid-off
Hastings to Rahane, 2 runs slower short ball on middle, paddled to long leg as Rahane gets his fifty. He punches gloves with Kohli

Hastings to Rahane, OUT #MCG is so big, Rahane can't clear the fielder. He jumps out, Hastings bangs it short. Rahane drags a pull, Smith runs to his right from long-on, catches it at the edge of the boundary. He loses his balance but tosses the ball over to the man running from deep midwicket (Maxi). We saw a similar catch in the Big Bash Sydney derby yesterday. Silk and
Hastings to Kohli, no run Kohli steps out, Hastings pitches it short. Quietly blocked back to the bowler
Hastings to Kohli, 2 runs slower ball at 118ks, inside edged behind square
Hastings to Kohli, FOUR runs Kohli skips down the track and pulls it away towards long-on. Smith slides in vain now
Hastings to Kohli, no run again, he uses his feet. Laced it to Bailey at short cover. Australia's fielding has been spot on today too
Faulkner to Dhoni, 1 run dropped short and outside off, Dhoni pulls hard to deep midwicket
Faulkner to Kohli, 1 wide off-wide wide, yorker goes too wide
Faulkner to Kohli, 1 run yorker outside off, Faulkner succeeds in hitting the blockhole, squeezed out to extra cover
Faulkner to Dhoni, SIX runs Dhoni tees off! A bit short, slower back of the hand ball, hoicked flat and hard over midwicket
Faulkner to Dhoni, 1 wide Faulkner loses his cool. Hurls another off-side wide
Faulkner to Dhoni, FOUR runs low full toss outside off, Dhoni lays into it and smears it past extra cover
Faulkner to Dhoni, 1 run back of a length and outside off, jabbed to Bailey at extra cover
Faulkner to Kohli, 1 run Faulkner digs short as Kohli steps out. Weakly pulled to long-on
Hastings to Jadeja, 1 run low full toss outside off, eased to deep cover
Hastings to Dhoni, no run hurled pretty full and outside off from wide of the crease, Dhoni dances out. Swings and misses
Hastings to Dhoni, FOUR runs back of a length legcutter outside off, Dhoni picks it up and lifts it over backward square leg
Hastings to Dhoni, SIX runs Hastings errs is length, this low full toss is smashed over long-on

Hastings to Dhoni, OUT four, six, and out! Dhoni spanks it, Maxi takes it, he feels the heat. Wrings his hands. Dhoni danced out again, Hastings banged it onto the middle of the pitch at 140ks. Pulled to deep midwicket, where Maxi hangs onto the catch
Hastings to Jadeja, 1 run low full toss outside off, cracked to deep cover
Faulkner to Jadeja, 2 wide slash and a miss outside off, wide called. I suspect that was the slower one. Wade fumbles
Faulkner to R Dhawan, no run full on off, slower at 116ks, weak drive back to Faulkner
Faulkner to R Dhawan, 2 runs another slower ball, this one at 111ks, down the track and slogged to long-on
Faulkner to R Dhawan, 1 run slower full ball, Rishi goes deep in the crease, slog-sweeping over to Smith at long-on
Faulkner to Jadeja, 1 run pitched up and outside off, drilled to deep cover. Richardson keeps it to just one
Faulkner to R Dhawan, no run slower one again, slanted across off, Rishi goes low, slogs and fails to connect
Faulkner to R Dhawan, no run Faulkner closes the innings with his assortment of slower balls. Rishi swings wildly, but can't lay bat on it

Kohli: I love to bat with Rahane. MS was charged up today. He wanted to smack a few today. On a slowish wicket, he has done a tremendous job. The guys are excited to make it 2-1. It is not an easier track to bat on.
Shashank will call the chase. Ciao

Australia's bowlers, however, impressed, and were ably backed up by their fielders. Hastings pounded the deck and claimed his career-best ODI figures. Richardson too hurried batsmen and they tied down Dhawan. The opener scratched his way to a fifty, Rahane's was more fluent, Kohli struck 117, and Dhoni produced a cameo. But India could not cross 300. The visitors managed only 46
5:51pm: India finish with 295 for 6. It doesn't look enough, again. Their bowlers have another tough task ahead, with their batsmen not connecting with enough blows in the death.

6:10pm Interesting thoughts from Wasim Akram. He reckons 295 at the MCG is worth more than it actually is, considering the dimensions of the ground. Will the Indian bowlers prove him right? The series is on the line. MS Dhoni will need a big performance from Ishant and Umesh, especially in Ashwin's absence.
Our stats man Bharath Seervi with another interesting nugget: Teams have posted 265+ eight times against Australia at 'The G'. The hosts have chased them down successfully on five occasions.
6:30pm Players are making their way out. Will MS try something different and hand the new ball to Umesh? Will he hold Sran back as the first change bowler. We'll find out very soon.
Yes, Umesh it will be. Shaun Marsh on strike. Fasten your seat belts
Ishant into the attack
Yadav to Marsh, no run moves away from off stump, squeezed towards cover point
Yadav to Marsh, no run good delivery, length ball, closer to the stumps, Marsh hops back and plays it with soft hands
Yadav to Marsh, 1 run looks to crash it through cover, ends up slicing it behind point towards third man

Yadav to Finch, 3 runs stands tall and punches it between the two cover fielders, good chase by Rahane but a weak throw. Once again a back of length delivery, good bat flow from Finch as he came down on it
Yadav to Marsh, no run turned towards mid-on this time, Marsh was hurried for pace on that occasion

Yadav to Marsh, FOUR runs beautiful flow of the bat once again. Pitched up, not much movement, Marsh plants his front foot forward and essays a classic cover drive past the diving Virat Kohli at wide mid-off
Barinder Sran to Finch, no run floats it full and across Finch, left alone
Barinder Sran to Finch, 2 runs hops back and plays the Natraja shot, gets it into the gap at deep backward square leg
Barinder Sran to Finch, no run excellent stop by Jadeja at backward point, it was crunched but he threw himself to his left to stop that
Barinder Sran to Finch, 1 run gets a thick inside edge towards fine leg, lucky
Barinder Sran to Marsh, no run good delivery this time, more effort into the delivery, lands it ahead of good length around off, left alone

Barinder Sran to Marsh, FOUR runs wow! simply, wow. Half volley outside off, simply leans into the drive and eases it into the gap at cover. Sourav Ganguly would have been proud of that stroke. Nice high elbow as ball met bat, enough power. Once he found the gap, there was no stopping that
Sharma to Finch, no run another half volley outside off, this one's hit hard to Rohit at cover. Finch will be kicking himself, a boundary missed.
Sharma to Finch, 1 wide nips away from outside off, Finch watches it through to Dhoni. He was flirting with the wide line, umpire thinks it was wide enough
Sharma to Finch, 1 run angled it full on middle from wide of the crease, tucked to short midwicket for a quick single

Sharma to Marsh, 3 runs sliding into the pads, easy pickings, flicked into the gap at square leg, they're back for the third quite easily, can be tough to throw on the turn here. The throw from Rohit had no power whatsoever
Sharma to Finch, no run that's closer to the stumps, just a touch around off, held its line, left alone
Sharma to Finch, no run back of length delivery on off, tapped to short cover
Sharma to Finch, no run punched to Rohit at cover, no boundary of the over. Better one for India
Barinder Sran to Marsh, 3 runs gentle half volley on the pads, superbly flicked away, long boundary there at deep midwicket, they missed an opportunity to get back for the fourth. Poor bowling
Barinder Sran to Finch, FOUR runs short, wide and four! Sitting up nicely for Finch to use the width and put that away into the gap behind point. Easy pickings at any level of cricket really
Barinder Sran to Finch, FOUR runs gentle full toss this time on off, Finch says 'thank you very much'. Leans forward, goes through the line and beats cover. No chance of stopping that
Barinder Sran to Finch, no run straight in and straight out. Gurkeerat puts down a sitter at mid-off. It was right in the slot to drive, he hit it hard, he looked like grabbing that, popped out.
Barinder Sran to Finch, no run back of length delivery on off, left alone
Barinder Sran to Finch, no run excellent stop by Rohit, throwing himself to his right, deflected to Gurkeerat at mid-off. Saved a certain boundary
Sharma to Marsh, 1 run gentle tap to mid-off as they scamper through for a quick single. Umesh was caught napping at mid-on, shouldn't have been a run
Sharma to Finch, no run good ball, angled in on off from wide of the crease at length, left alone
Sharma to Finch, no run hits the deck hard, extra bounce, hurries onto Finch's bat as he looks to defend off the back foot
Sharma to Finch, 1 run back of length delivery on middle, tucked wide of square leg

Sharma to Marsh, FOUR runs short ball at 137 kph, enough time for Marsh to swivel and pull that one behind square. Picked the bones out of that one. Rolled his wrists to keep it down, raced away into the boundary
Sharma to Marsh, no run nips away from length area outside off, left alone

Yadav to Finch, OUT a wicket finally. The outside edge has been found courtesy some late movement. Good length, drew him forward, Finch went for the drive, but the foot was nowhere to the pitch of the ball, gets a thin edge which MS accepts gleefully. The manner in which he threw the ball up after pouching that had relief written all over it. He doesn't generally get very
Yadav to Smith, 1 wide this one is directed down leg side, some work for the umpire
Yadav to Smith, 2 runs too straight this time, tucked away wide of midwicket, off the mark with two easy runs
Yadav to Smith, no run full on middle, driven to mid-on
Yadav to Smith, no run late movement again, full on middle, Smith is slightly squared up as he defends it to mid-on
Yadav to Smith, 1 run punched to point where Jadeja dives to his right to save a certain boundary, they get through for the single though
Yadav to Marsh, no run shapes away from outside off, left alone
Sharma to Smith, no run back of length delivery on off, defended to the off side
Sharma to Smith, no run punched through the line, straight to Shikhar D at cover point
Sharma to Smith, no run another punch, another stop by Shikhar
Sharma to Smith, FOUR runs short ball, Smith manages to get enough bat on it as he fetches the pull from outside off, beats the gap between midwicket and mid-on

Sharma to Smith, FOUR runs not all that short this time, but another pull that has split the gap on the on side. Went like a rocket. Only a batsman in the form of his life can think of playing that stroke. That Smith is in the form of his life would be an understatement
Sharma to Smith, no run prods forward half-heartedly, gets an inside edge onto the pad
Yadav to Marsh, no run beaten on the drive, played outside the line, doesn't carry to Dhoni
Yadav to Marsh, 1 leg bye beaten for pace, thuds into the thigh pad, rolls to the on side as they steal a bye
Yadav to Smith, no run full and swinging in on middle and off, Smith gets a thick inside edge towards midwicket
Yadav to Smith, no run peach of a delivery. Lands it a touch ahead of the length area on off, this one nips away just a touch, Smith is beaten as he looks to hit through the line
Yadav to Smith, FOUR runs beats the diving Jadeja at backward point. Right line, but wrong length. Too short, he unfurls his wrists superbly to beat the infield
Yadav to Smith, no run full on off, carefully defended to the off side
R Dhawan to Marsh, no run bowls a cutter to start off, short around off, kept a little low, Marsh is beaten on the pull

R Dhawan to Marsh, no run nice and full on off, driven to mid-off. Kohli effects a direct hit at the bowler's end but Smith's bat is well inside the crease. Third umpire was called for a mere formality
R Dhawan to Marsh, no run tight line, just in and around the off stump, he gets forward and plays it with soft hands
R Dhawan to Marsh, no run good chance of pace, well disguised, Marsh shaped to drive but checked his shot at the last moment, defended to the cover fielder
R Dhawan to Marsh, 2 runs width on offer this time, squeezed away behind point, Sran covers good ground from third man, dishes in a dive to pull that back in
R Dhawan to Marsh, 2 runs once again eased behind point towards Sran, excellent running between the wickets. Not a bad first over from Rishi D
Yadav to Smith, 1 run just short of Rahane at midwicket. Slice of luck for Smith. Looked to flick that past the fielder, didn't get enough bat on that. Few words exchanged between Smith and Umesh
Yadav to Marsh, 1 run hurried for pace, still manages to awkwardly whip that towards square leg
Yadav to Smith, 2 runs excellent punch again, width on offer, eased into the gap at cover point, third man had to run in to stop that
Yadav to Smith, 3 runs width on offer, eased towards third man where Sran runs around, does all the hard work but can't time his dive, parries the ball further but recovers well enough to save a run
Yadav to Marsh, 2 runs pulled handsomely in front of square this time, but there is protection in the deep
Yadav to Marsh, no run better length, a touch fuller and just around off, carefully defended off the back foot
R Dhawan to Smith, 1 run slow leg cutter on off, pushed to deep cover
R Dhawan to Marsh, no run floats it full and across Marsh, angling away, left alone
R Dhawan to Marsh, no run tight line on middle, pushed to mid-on. Not much swing but he's been accurate largely
R Dhawan to Marsh, 2 runs the slower one is bowled full and wide this time, Marsh goes after that one, slices it over the infield, deep cover comes around to stop that
R Dhawan to Marsh, 1 run nice drive down to Kohli at long-off
R Dhawan to Smith, 1 run full ball on middle, eased down the ground to mid-on
Gurkeerat to Smith, 1 run tossed up on middle, played to long on
Gurkeerat to Marsh, 1 run eased wide of cover
Gurkeerat to Smith, no run spins back in from outside off, gets a thick inside edge towards square leg
Gurkeerat to Smith, no run played to midwicket this time. Shouts of 'badiya' from MSD
Gurkeerat to Smith, 1 run half-stop by Rahane at midwicket gives them the single
Gurkeerat to Marsh, FOUR runs too short this time, cut away into the gap. Cry of anguish from Dhoni this time. Got into position early and executed that cut shot to perfection
R Dhawan to Smith, no run slower and fuller on off, played back to the bowler
R Dhawan to Smith, no run authoritative drive, but a diving Rohit took the pace off the ball, it deflected towards mid-off
R Dhawan to Smith, FOUR runs that will definitely frustrate Dhoni, who was standing up to the stumps. Drifting down leg, tickled easily into the fine leg boundary
R Dhawan to Smith, no run defended back down the pitch
R Dhawan to Smith, no run pushed to short cover again
R Dhawan to Smith, 1 run slower and fuller, eased to deep cover
Gurkeerat to Smith, no run tossed up on off, pushed back to the bowler
Gurkeerat to Smith, no run gets forward and pats it with soft hands
Gurkeerat to Smith, FOUR runs tossed up on off, gets to the pitch and crashes that into the cover boundary. Rohit dived across but it was hit really hard
Gurkeerat to Smith, no run steps out and plays it back to the bowler
Gurkeerat to Smith, 1 run turns back in, tucked to short fine to bring the 100 up. India were 34 behind at the same point
Gurkeerat to Marsh, no run gets forward and smothers the spin
R Dhawan to Smith, no run angles it full on middle from wide of the crease, pushed to mid-on
R Dhawan to Smith, no run driven straight to Rahane at cover, accurate stuff
R Dhawan to Smith, no run excellent stop by Jadeja at point again, timed well once again by Smith
R Dhawan to Smith, no run bowls it full on middle, Rishi puts his hand out to stop that firm drive back down the ground
R Dhawan to Smith, 2 runs slower one on off stump, eased into the gap at cover where Ishant misfields
R Dhawan to Smith, 1 run shows the full face of the bat and eases it down to long on
Gurkeerat to Smith, 1 run steps out and turns the low full toss into the midwicket region
Gurkeerat to Marsh, no run gets forward and eases it with soft hands to cover
Gurkeerat to Marsh, no run steps out but doesn't get underneath it, squeezed back to the bowler
Gurkeerat to Marsh, no run slow turn from off, cuts to point
Gurkeerat to Marsh, 3 runs gets a thick edge that flies behind point, Jadeja dives across and pulls one back in
Gurkeerat to Smith, 1 run steps out and whips it to midwicket
Jadeja to Smith, no run tossed up on middle, driven impressively, Kohli throws himself to his right at short cover and makes a smart save
Jadeja to Smith, 1 run fired on middle, whipped to long on
Jadeja to Marsh, 2 runs drifting into the pads, neat little glance to long leg
Jadeja to Marsh, 1 run another non-turning ball, this is flicked past midwicket
Jadeja to Bailey, 1 run looped up on middle, front-foot drive to long-off
Gurkeerat to Bailey, 1 run steps out and turns it to square leg, a direct hit at the bowler's end from Jadeja and Bailey would have been struggling. In fact gone
Gurkeerat to Marsh, no run dabbed with soft hands to the off side
Gurkeerat to Marsh, 1 run steps out and turns it to long on
Gurkeerat to Bailey, 1 run nicely tossed up outside off, driven firmly to wide long-off
Gurkeerat to Marsh, 1 run makes room and eases that one to deep cover
Gurkeerat to Bailey, 1 run steps out and whips it wide of midwicket
Jadeja to Bailey, FOUR runs chips down the track and hits it down the ground over mid-on, safe shot given the fielder was in
Jadeja to Bailey, 1 run sliding into middle and leg, tucked wide of midwicket
Jadeja to Marsh, no run turned with the spin to midwicket
Jadeja to Marsh, no run fires it into the stumps, Marsh stays inside the crease and defends it down the pitch
Jadeja to Marsh, 1 run turned wide of Kohli at mid-on for a quick single
Jadeja to Bailey, no run good stop off his own bowling, it was a firm drive
R Dhawan to Marsh, no run chops one towards backward point

R Dhawan to Marsh, 2 runs full outside off, squeezed into the gap behind point, back for the second to get to a fifty. Soaks in the applause of the crowd, but knows the job is just half done. 12th fifty for him
R Dhawan to Marsh, no run beaten as he looks to ease that behind point, this one was too full, cramped for room
R Dhawan to Marsh, 1 run slower and fuller on off, mistimes that one back past the bowler
R Dhawan to Bailey, no run pushed firmly to mid-off

R Dhawan to Bailey, FOUR runs too short, sitting up nicely for him to play the pull, Dhawan comes around, does all the hard work and then falls over, in trying to push it back in, he manages to push it into the boundary instead. Surely the crowd behind him will keep buzzing in his ears. Can be massively embarrassing
Jadeja to Marsh, no run pushed to Rohit at cover
Jadeja to Marsh, no run spins back in, looks to whip that one, hit on the thigh pad
Jadeja to Marsh, 1 run this time, he manages to get it into the gap at midwicket
Jadeja to Bailey, no run drifts in and spins away, tapped back to the bowler
Jadeja to Bailey, 1 run driven with the spin to long off
Jadeja to Marsh, no run quicker one on middle from wide of the crease, played back to the bowler
R Dhawan to Bailey, FOUR runs pierces the gap between cover and mid-off. Not all that bad a delivery but he simply put the front foot forward and hit through the line. Perfect balance, super timing
R Dhawan to Bailey, no run sliding down leg, tickles the pad as Dhoni stops that down leg. Stifled appeal, but more out of hope than anything else
R Dhawan to Bailey, 1 run tucked down to fine leg, Umesh was quick to get off the blocks
R Dhawan to Marsh, no run full on middle, turned to mid-on
R Dhawan to Marsh, FOUR runs crunching cover drive. Juicy half volley this time, leans forward and crunches that into the gap. Second boundary of the over. What flow
R Dhawan to Marsh, no run outstanding stop by Jadeja at point again. Would have saved at least 10 runs on the field today, yet India find themselves well behind in the piece
Jadeja to Bailey, no run pushed to cover
Jadeja to Bailey, 1 run turns away, eased wide of cover for an easy single
Jadeja to Marsh, no run round-armish this time, lands it on middle, turned to midwicket
Jadeja to Marsh, no run hurries onto him, defended
Jadeja to Marsh, 2 runs sliding down leg, tickled towards the fine leg region, easily done
Jadeja to Marsh, no run tucked to square leg
Gurkeerat to Bailey, 1 run swept with the spin to deep backward square
Gurkeerat to Marsh, 1 run played with soft hands to short midwicket, quick single taken again
Gurkeerat to Bailey, 1 run hit to mid-on, they get across for a risky single
Gurkeerat to Marsh, 1 run steps out and eases it with the spin to long off
Gurkeerat to Bailey, no run steps out, looks to turn it with the spin, hit straight to Kohli
Gurkeerat to Bailey, 1 run tossed up nicely, bit of spin on that one, driven inside-out to long off

Jadeja to Bailey, OUT beautifully bowled. Ball drifts back in, rips off the surface, turns square, ball zips past Bailey's half-hearted prod, his back foot was in the air as Dhoni collected it cleanly and whipped the bails off in a split second. He made it look so easy. His back foot was on the line. That will definitely even the scales once again. Dhoni knew immediately
Jadeja to Maxwell, no run gets forward and defends
Jadeja to Maxwell, no run beats the outside edge this time, square turn for Jadeja again. Dhoni whips the bails off again. He's on fire. This time, the back foot was inside the crease
Jadeja to Maxwell, no run pushed to Kohli at cover
Jadeja to Maxwell, no run pushed through quicker, gets some fizz again from middle, Maxi gets back and pushes it back with a straight bat
Jadeja to Maxwell, 1 run eases it with the spin to long-off, gets off the mark
Sharma to Maxwell, no run played back to the bowler
Sharma to Maxwell, no run pitched up outside off, driven well but Kohli throws himself to his left to stop that
Sharma to Maxwell, 2 runs floats it full on middle and off, doesn't get enough timing but there's still enough to squeeze that past midwicket
Sharma to Maxwell, 1 run chops it behind point for an easy single
Sharma to Marsh, no run full and sliding across the batsman, left alone
Sharma to Marsh, no run driven well, Ishant manages to stop that on his followthrough, nearly deflected it back onto the stumps at the bowler's end
Jadeja to Maxwell, FOUR runs doesn't take long for him to unfurl the reverse sweep. Hit fiercely over point. Quick change of grip and boom!
Jadeja to Maxwell, no run played to midwicket, this one was pushed through quicker on middle again
Jadeja to Maxwell, no run makes room and punches it to Kohli at cover
Jadeja to Maxwell, 1 wide round-arm action again, this one's sliding down leg, excellent take by Dhoni
Jadeja to Maxwell, 2 runs makes room and chips it inside-out over extra cover, lot of work for the boundary rider
Jadeja to Maxwell, no run gets back and defends it to cover this time
Jadeja to Maxwell, 1 run sharp turn again from off, bunted behind point for an easy single
Sharma to Maxwell, 1 run angling into middle and leg, flicked behind square to deep fine leg
Sharma to Marsh, no run driven firmly but can't pierce cover, straight to Kohli who has a glare at Maxwell at the non-striker's end
Sharma to Marsh, 1 run excellent square drive, straight to Rohit in the deep
Sharma to Maxwell, 2 runs short on middle and leg, pulled away into the gap, Umesh does well to come around from deep fine again
Sharma to Maxwell, 1 run short and wide outside off, punched to deep point

Sharma to Marsh, OUT huge roar from Ishant, and that tells you how much it means to him! Coming back to the delivery, it was a length ball that was angling across, good seam position, the ball held its line, Marsh nibbled at that one without any conviction, got a thin edge, straightforward catch for MS Dhoni. India back into this big time
Barinder Sran to Maxwell, 1 run length ball on off, punched to deep cover
Barinder Sran to Marsh, no run gets back into the crease and bunts it to the off side, loud call of no as soon as he hit it
Barinder Sran to Marsh, 1 run gets to the pitch and drives that one to deep cover, off the mark

Barinder Sran to Maxwell, FOUR runs good clean strike down the ground. Nice juicy half volley on off, Marsh shows the full face of the bat and lofts him nice and clean, one bounce into the long-on boundary
Barinder Sran to Maxwell, 1 run bunts it down to third man, sensible stuff

Barinder Sran to Marsh, FOUR runs beautifully struck down the ground. Poor ball and that has been easily hit back past the mid-on fielder. Lovely timing. Straight bat down to generate the power and timing
Sharma to Maxwell, FOUR runs improvisation at its best. Short ball on middle, Maxwell arches back and directs it over Dhoni's head. You can't seat a fielder for that stroke
Sharma to Maxwell, no run stands tall and punches it to mid-off
Sharma to Maxwell, 1 run plays that down to Sran at third man, quickly off the blocks on that occasion
Sharma to Marsh, no run gets half-forward and bunts it to point
Sharma to Marsh, 1 leg bye extra bounce this time, hits him high on the right thigh, and they take a leg-bye. A direct hit from Jadeja at the bowler's end would have been interesting
Sharma to Maxwell, 1 run angled into middle and leg, tucked to fine leg
Yadav to Maxwell, no run back of length delivery on off, punched to Kohli at cover
Yadav to Maxwell, 1 run forced off the back foot to deep point
Yadav to Marsh, no run closer to the stumps this time, length ball, played back to the bowler
Yadav to Marsh, no run looks to play a pull off the front foot, toe ends it to mid on
Yadav to Marsh, FOUR runs that's what annoys Dhoni the most about Umesh. Short and angling down leg, he helps it on its way into the fine leg boundary. Long hop that deserved to be put away
Yadav to Marsh, FOUR runs another poor ball. Result the same. Down leg side, tickled into the fine leg boundary. Umesh quickly looks away even as a helpless Dhoni gestures towards him
Barinder Sran to Maxwell, no run sliding into middle, looks to tuck it past square leg, misses
Barinder Sran to Maxwell, no run full on off from wide of the crease, nips away a touch, Maxwell's squared up as he defends
Barinder Sran to Maxwell, 2 runs plays a half-pull down to Dhawan at fine leg, was cramped for room but went through with the stroke
Barinder Sran to Maxwell, 1 run runs it down to third man
Barinder Sran to Marsh, no run angles it full once again, touch of movement as well, played back down the pitch
Barinder Sran to Marsh, 2 runs flays that one to deep cover, excellent running between the wickets
Yadav to Maxwell, no run hit firmly to Shikhar at mid-off
Yadav to Maxwell, no run closer to the stumps this time, length ball, played back down the pitch with soft hands
Yadav to Maxwell, 1 run appeal for lbw, Maxi is struck on the pad as he looks to run it down to third man, was perhaps struck outside the line
Yadav to Marsh, no run length ball on off, pushed to cover
Yadav to Marsh, no run appeal for lbw as the ball tails back in to hit him on leg. Mitch Marsh was rushed into that attempted flick, umpire reckons it was sliding down. Good call

Yadav to Marsh, 2 runs shows the full face of the bat and plays it down to Ishant, who makes a mess of that at mid-on, what was meant to be a dot ball is two instead. He took his eyes off the ball. Very, very poor. Kohli is livid and he has every right to be.

Barinder Sran to Maxwell, 2 runs, OUT steps out and crunches that wide of mid-off, Umesh gives it chase, turns around and fires a throw towards Dhoni's end. Mitch Marsh was strolling back casually as the stumps are broken down by the Indian captain, who didn't give any hint of rushing in to take the throw at all. Within the bat of an eye lid, the next thing Mitch Marsh kn
Barinder Sran to Wade, 1 run angled down leg, turned it down to square leg, easy ball to get off the mark
Barinder Sran to Maxwell, 1 run pulled towards Gurkeerat at deep midwicket
Barinder Sran to Wade, no run tails back in slightly from off stump, carefully defended to the on side
Barinder Sran to Wade, no run nips back in from the length area on off, defended to the off side
Barinder Sran to Wade, no run tapped towards point with soft hands
Sharma to Maxwell, 1 run pushes him onto the back foot by digging one short on off, dropped towards cover with soft hands for a quick single
Sharma to Wade, 1 run wrong line, pulled away but straight to deep midwicket
Sharma to Maxwell, 1 run good line once again, in and around off, pats it towards Jadeja at point and scoots across for a single, brilliant effort to fire a direct hit at the non-striker's end
Sharma to Wade, 1 run too full this time, driven nicely towards deep cover
Sharma to Maxwell, no run angles it ahead of good length on off from wide of the crease, defended to midwicket, he was overbalanced as he made contact
Sharma to Maxwell, no run accurate stuff, lands it on off, played back down the pitch
Barinder Sran to Wade, 1 run angles a length ball on middle and leg, thuds into the thigh pad as he looks to work it past square leg
Barinder Sran to Maxwell, no run looks to step out and slap that over the off side, cramped for room, beaten
Barinder Sran to Maxwell, 1 run gets a thick edge down to Ishant at third man, big cheer from the crowd as he fields it. Ishant waves back to the crowd
Barinder Sran to Wade, 1 run nearly chopped back onto the stumps, Dhoni runs in and then uses his football skills to kick it onto the stumps at the striker's end, misses but Maxwell may have been in
Barinder Sran to Maxwell, 1 run pulled but straight to Gurkeerat at deep midwicket
Barinder Sran to Wade, 1 run mistimes the pull to Rohit at mid-on

Sharma to Wade, OUT short ball angling away, Wade looks to fetch the pull from outside off, only manages to top edge the pull, Dhawan comes running in from mid-on, settles underneath it and completes a simple catch. Wade didn't look comfortable at all. Was overbalanced too, and the pressure has consumed him when all he had to do was bunt one and give strike to Maxwell. Th
Sharma to Maxwell, 1 run angles one down to third man, excellent work by Rishi Dhawan to keep it down to a single
Sharma to Faulkner, no run nice and full around off, shows the full face and plays it with soft hands

Sharma to Faulkner, 1 run nearly chopped it back onto the stumps. Dhoni does superbly to move to his left, dive and keep that down to a single. On another night, he would have been walking back to the pavillion
Sharma to Maxwell, no run gets an inside edge as he prods outside the line, the point fielder Jadeja comes running in quickly to cut that off
Sharma to Maxwell, 1 run tucked away towards midwicket

Barinder Sran to Maxwell, FOUR runs short ball on off, he clears the front leg and slaps that over cover, couple of bounces into the boundary. Sitting up nicely because there was no pace on it. He will feast on those all day
Barinder Sran to Maxwell, 2 runs slower one on middle and leg, nurdled into the gap at midwicket, excellent running there, just got it in between the two fielders there
Barinder Sran to Maxwell, no run appeal for caught behind. Maxwell backed away to go over point, the swing seemed to have missed the outside edge, or did it? Faint deviation on snicko
Barinder Sran to Maxwell, 1 wide slower delivery down leg, Maxwell avoids it at the last moment, right call in the end

Barinder Sran to Maxwell, SIX runs how much power does he generate! Backs away once again, the short ball was coming in, but backed himself to slap that over the infield and managed to get it all the way over the boundary. So what if the square boundaries are huge? He can still muscle them
Barinder Sran to Maxwell, no run Jadeja has single-handedly saved two runs at least, clubs the pull, he throws himself to his left to stop that and then recover quickly to fire a rocket throw
Barinder Sran to Maxwell, no run slower one on middle, plyed back down the pitch
Yadav to Faulkner, no run length ball on off, bunted to cover
Yadav to Faulkner, 1 run turned away off his pad towards square leg
Yadav to Maxwell, no run punched to Rohit at point
Yadav to Maxwell, no run fetches the whip from outside off, straight to Ishant at square leg
Yadav to Maxwell, no run length ball on off, hustled for pace, he hops back and taps it back down the pitch
Yadav to Maxwell, no run shapes to pull, ball kept low and hurried on to hit him on the right thigh. Looks to scamper through but Umesh gets across quickly
Jadeja to Faulkner, 1 run into the pads, tucked to midwicket for an easy single
Jadeja to Maxwell, 1 run fired into middle, backs away and drives it to long-off
Jadeja to Faulkner, 1 run misfield at cover by Rishi, Jadeja hares across to keep it down to a single
Jadeja to Maxwell, 1 run backs away to cut, cramped for room, still gets some bat on it, rolls to point
Jadeja to Faulkner, no run pushed through quicker on middle, squeezed back down the pitch
Jadeja to Faulkner, 1 run eased wide of the bowler to long-on
Yadav to Faulkner, no run superb delivery. Lands it at length on off, the ball cuts back in sharply, Faulkner pushes outside the line and is cut into half, just goes over the stumps. Cracking stuff
Yadav to Faulkner, no run hit back down the ground to mid-off, went hard at it, only managed to toe end it
Yadav to Faulkner, 1 run full on middle, turned away to midwicket, Faulkner called for two, but Gurkeerat was in quickly, fired the throw
Yadav to Maxwell, SIX runs clears the front leg and tonks one over long-off. Cross-court fore hand, anybody? He sure can try that at the Rod Laver Arena tomorrow.
Yadav to Maxwell, 2 runs too full on the pads, gets across and works it into the gap between deep midwicket and long-on

Yadav to Maxwell, (no ball) FOUR runs high full toss outside off, he backs away and slaps it over cover, didn't get hold of it but still managed to clear the in-field quite astonishingly. Free hit time
Yadav to Maxwell, 1 run excellent stop by Kohli at cover, saved three there.
Jadeja to Maxwell, no run backs away to hit over cover, changes his mind and taps it back to the bowler
Jadeja to Maxwell, 2 runs steps out and works it towards square leg, excellent running, Umesh caught napping
Jadeja to Maxwell, 1 run punched wide of cover
Jadeja to Faulkner, 1 run turns away, he opens the face of the bat and gets it down to deep cover
Jadeja to Maxwell, no run played with the spin to Kohli at cover
Jadeja to Maxwell, 1 run fired into middle and leg, worked towards square leg, Shikhar is alert to the possibility of the second
Sharma to Maxwell, 1 run floats it full on off, driven to long-off
Sharma to Faulkner, 1 run tip and run, like well all do at street cricket. Plays it with soft hands towards Gurkeerat at cover
Sharma to Maxwell, no run backs away to slap that over cover, no room to work with, beaten. Excellent change of pace from Ishant, it was the leg-cutter

Sharma to Maxwell, no run slower one again on middle and leg, turned to Umesh at square leg, Maxwell was miles outside the crease, not sure why Umesh didn't throw. There was no one backing up alright, but he should have taken the chance and fired the throw
Sharma to Maxwell, 1 run tucked round the corner towards fine leg
Sharma to Faulkner, 1 run shows the full face of the bat and eases it down to long on
Jadeja to Faulkner, FOUR runs draws an outside edge that races away past short third man. No slip, no one at 45, the pace on the ball was enough
Jadeja to Faulkner, 1 run worked across the line to long on

Jadeja to Maxwell, FOUR runs steps out and chips it inside-out into the cover boundary. They had the fielder in the deep for a reverse sweep, this time he got to the pitch and placed it superbly into the gap

Jadeja to Maxwell, no run steps out, Jadeja fires it into middle and leg, deflects off the pad to the off side, Jadeja got to it quickly and fired a throw at the bowler's end. Direct hit and Faulkner was struggling
Jadeja to Maxwell, no run gets away this time, the reverse sweep finds Ishant at short third man
Jadeja to Maxwell, 1 run sliding into middle, worked to mid-on
Sharma to Maxwell, FOUR runs buffet bowling, as Geoff Boycott would say. Short and angling down leg, tickled into the fine leg boundary. Pressure's off.
Sharma to Maxwell, 1 run worked across the line towards square leg
Sharma to Faulkner, no run can't pierce the gap on the off side, straight to Kohli at cover
Sharma to Faulkner, 2 runs steps out and eases it into the gap at square third man, back easily for the second run. Just backed away, made room and chopped it nicely
Sharma to Faulkner, no run crunched but straight to Rohit at cover this time
Sharma to Faulkner, 2 runs gets a thick inside edge but the long-on fielder had to come in a long way, back for the second without a fuss
Jadeja to Maxwell, 1 run slices it wide of point, didn't get to the pitch of the ball as he looked to go over cover
Jadeja to Faulkner, no run drifts in and spins away, played back to the bowler
Jadeja to Faulkner, no run fired into middle, dabbed back down the pitch
Jadeja to Faulkner, 2 runs excellent stop by Shikhar at deep square, it was a fierce sweep shot, covered ground, dived to cover the line
Jadeja to Faulkner, 1 leg bye deflects off the pad, but there is short fine leg
Jadeja to Maxwell, 1 run low full toss outside off, squeezed to cover and they scamper through for a single. That's the end of Jadeja's spell. Quite brilliant
Yadav to Maxwell, no run backs away to slap it over the infield, hits it well, one bounce to Shikhar at mid-off, doesn't take the run despite one being easily available

Yadav to Maxwell, SIX runs he's hit that 15 rows back into the long boundary at long-on. Umesh floats it full on middle and leg, Maxwell backs away and swings cleanly down the ground. What elevation, pinged the middle of the bat

Yadav to Maxwell, FOUR runs short, wide and he cracks that up and over backward point, huge gap there, deep cover fielder did a 200-metre sprint but couldn't get anywhere near the ball. Maxi one hit away from a century

Yadav to Maxwell, OUT looks for the glory hit, the length ball gets a little big on him, can't get any power behind that attempted slap over cover, Dhawan, running back from mid-off, keeps his eye on the ball and takes it well. It was swirling in the air but he kept his composure. Has come a little too late for India. Maxwell walks off to a huge round of applause. What a
Yadav to Faulkner, 1 run dabbed wide of point for an easy run as Australia take an unassailable lead in the five-match series
Didn't someone say the other night that it's written in Faulkner's contract to hit the winning runs? He's done it again

Two Rohit tons, and now a Kohli century in vain. A better performance from the bowlers and the fielders, but was still not enough to stop the Australians. Could have been a lot closer, but Maxwell was the difference between the sides on the night. A terrific exhibition of uninhibited hitting took the game away from India at a time when the game was on a knife's edge. Ishant bowl
Thanks for joining us. Hope you enjoyed the coverage. Until next time, it's goodbye from the commentary desk. Cheers!
Australia won by 3 wickets (with 7 balls remaining)
Player of the match is Glenn Maxwell, AUS
